alert.note: Alert for Dyer; Haywood; Lake; Lauderdale; Obion; Tipton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 13 at 3:34PM CDT until April 13 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI...PEMISCOT...TIPTON...DYER...WESTERN OBION... LAUDERDALE...WESTERN HAYWOOD AND LAKE COUNTIES... At 333 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Portageville to near Cooter to near Dixonville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Dyersburg, Blytheville, Ripley, Osceola, Caruthersville, Portageville, Hayti, Steele, Luxora, Wilson, Reelfoot Lake State Park, Fort Pillow State Park, Munford, Tiptonville, Newbern, Brighton, Halls, Ridgely, Hayti Heights and Joiner. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for eastern Arkansas...southeastern Missouri...and western Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Dyer; Haywood; Lake; Lauderdale; Obion; Tipton
